review_blob: Hazy yellow, lasting white foam. Lemon (peel), pineapple & pines. Long lasting aftertaste, but moderate bitterness (for an IPA). I took this one by recommendation in Leipzigs Beer Freunde and it was a very nice surprise. Shame I wouldnt be able to drink it more often - Ill have to comfort myself in Thornbridges Halcyon and BrewDogs JackHammer, similar in attributes (although lower on bitterness), but also in quality. Great beer!

Mighty little porter. Taste: coffee and dark chocolate, and just a bit of dark fruits. Quite dry. and robust, but that suits me fine. Etiquettes nice, too. Im buying this again, and again. Good luck, guys.
